name: Fire Valley Outbreak
description:
Thank you for checking out my first ever game!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Shield

Shift - Boost

There are 3 levels.

Made for the 21st GM48 (Theme: One Health). 

Completed within 48 hours by a one man team.  

Got 7th place out of about 80ish in gameplay :)

Link to Game Jam page: https://gm48.net/game/383/fire-valleyoutbreak
